channel.title: Customizing Castle Wars?
channel.description:
Hi, I was planning on making a server with only castle wars and nothing else, but I want to customize it. Now I know what I want to do is difficult, but if you have any ideas let me know.
The following is what I want to do.
1) Make CW a PK zone 2) Remove the ladders and trap doors to underground tunnels 3) Make the catapult do 10 damage to anyone stand in a specific radius (can be a fixed spot forever) 4) Make the bank accessible during the game 5) Make the skipping stones transfer you to the coordinates of the opposite side of the water 6) Make barricades working and solid (unable to go through)
Any help towards any idea is greatly appreciated. :)
Thanks
Aksha

item.title: Customizing Castle Wars?
item.dc:creator: @aksha aksha
item.description:
@aksha wrote:

Eh, it’s okay i’ll get some eventually. not saying you have to help.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 07:22:22 PM[/size][hr]well still looking for ideas, anyone?

item.title: Customizing Castle Wars?
item.dc:creator: @kupo kupo
item.description:
@kupo wrote:

Yeah it’s all pretty simple stuff, and you could almost get the catapult to move around if you found the interface id and added the cases for the buttons to make the original absY and absX location move, but the crosshair would be harder but thats not a big problem.

Read full topic

Hi, I was planning on making a server with only castle wars and nothing else, but I want to customize it. Now I know what I want to do is difficult, but if you have any ideas let me know.
